definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This probably can save the owner a lot of money instead of applying one-off colouring.
sentences.chinese: 這種行爲比起一次性染色倒是可以給主人省下很多錢。

sentences.english: General considerations, one-time application of dry sludge per 667m2 should be less than 8 tons.
sentences.chinese: 總體考慮，一次性每畝施用幹污泥應控制在8噸以下。

sentences.english: Excluding the effects of one-time gains, operating losses were pared 32 per cent.
sentences.chinese: 扣除一次性收益影響，該業務營運虧損縮減32%。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a one-step forming device for quilt covers, which belongs to the technical field of cotton goods processing devices.
sentences.chinese: 被套一次性成形設備，屬於棉製品加工設備技術領域。

sentences.english: Wee do not want to include these kinds of non-recurring expenses in this transaction.
sentences.chinese: 我們不想將這類一次性費用包括在這筆交易中。

sentences.english: Results The cell livability of continuous exposure chemotherapy group was significantly lower than that of the group from once exposure chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 結果持續給藥組細胞存活率顯著低於一次性給藥組。

sentences.english: One-time fee with all future updates included free of charge.
sentences.chinese: 與免費包括的所有未來更新的一次性費。

sentences.english: Need a one-time deduction of 12 points contact me.
sentences.chinese: 需要一次性扣12分的聯繫我。

sentences.english: Keira's next bit of TV work was in this one-off drama.
sentences.chinese: 凱拉下一部稱得上是電視工作的是一個一次性的戲劇。

sentences.english: Introduce the development on a single use device for autologous blood transfusion.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了簡易一次性自體血回輸裝置的研製。

sentences.english: Washing and drying full loads is also more cost-effective in terms of power and water consumption.
sentences.chinese: 一次性洗好和烘乾所有的衣服更加節能和節水。

sentences.english: Use non-disposable items in picnics and summer festivals.
sentences.chinese: 在外野餐和夏日活動中使用非一次性用品。

sentences.english: A psionic power is a one-time psionic effect.
sentences.chinese: 心靈異能是一種一次性的心靈效果。

sentences.english: They tend to work part- time on one -off projects.
sentences.chinese: 他們傾向於在一次性項目上發展兼職工作。

sentences.english: The community also provides bedding and other disposable daily necessities for guests.
sentences.chinese: 該社區還給客人提供牀上用品和其他一次性日用品。

definition: variant of 一併|一并, to lump together/to treat along with all the others
second (i.e. number two)/second time/twice/(math.) quadratic (of degree two)
to take possession of/to get hold of
